amendment.description: Amendment requires a study of the national implications resulting from lifting the crude oil export ban with respect to consumers and the economy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 114-290 to require a study of the State of national implications of lifting the crude oil export ban with respect to consumers and the economy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lawrence amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lawrence amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mrs. Lawrence.
